CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If you need to add drawing information, check the Drawings Box and describe the drawing in the “Drawing Details” using the below format.
Drawing Type – Material – Length x Width x Depth
Example 1 – RSC – 32 ECT C Kraft – 12” x 5” x 4” Example 2 – Other – 5243 – 44 ECT B MW – 10” x 6” x 3.25”
CustomField.label: Drawing Details
